document.full_text: german chancellor angela merkel's conservative party said on monday it stood united behind its leader after some members blamed her for a humiliating loss in a state vote in baden-wuerttemberg.
document.title: party defends merkel against critics after election
lines_and_colors: german chancellor angela merkel's conservative party said on monday it stood united behind its leader after some members blamed her for a humiliating loss in a state vote in baden-wuerttemberg.
